functionDecorators.name: addPriceFeed
functionDecorators.description: Approves new Price Oracle Aggregator onlyAdmin - Only Admin can approves new price oracle aggreagtors.

parameterDecorators.name: priceFeedAddress
parameterDecorators.description: - Address of Chainlink smart contract aggregator.

parameterDecorators.name: priceFeedAddress
parameterDecorators.description: - Address of Chainlink smart contract aggregator.

returnDecorators.description: price - Price relation of aggregator (1 : price).
timeStamp - Timestamp of last update of price for particular aggregator.

functionDecorators.name: getPriceFeedInfo
functionDecorators.description: Helper Function: Returns Price Feed Aggregator Info.

parameterDecorators.name: priceFeedAddress
parameterDecorators.description: - Address of Chainlink smart contract aggregator.

returnDecorators.description: description - Short textual description of particular aggregator.
decimals - How many price decimals particular aggregator contains.

functionDecorators.name: removePriceFeed
functionDecorators.description: Cancels existing Price Oracle Aggregator onlyAdmin - Only Admin can cancel existing price oracle aggreagtors.

parameterDecorators.name: priceFeedAddress
parameterDecorators.description: - Address of Chainlink smart contract aggregator.
